arduino.command

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • arduino.command.Command
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GetCommand, HoldCommand, MoveCommand, RelaxCommand, SetCommand

    public abstract class Command
extends Object
    This class represents a command.
    Author:
    Jacob Glueck

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static String END
      The suffix added to the command type when the Arduino finishes the command.
      private static String RECEIVED
      The suffix added to the command type when the Arduino receives the command.
